internal.content:
import HomepageTemplate from '../components/Homepage.js';
export default HomepageTemplate;



<PageDescription>

>> I’m a designer with front-end skills from TLV who recently relocated in the MSP area. I love to design, writing code, motorcycling is my passion and learning new things is my thing.

</PageDescription>



<Row>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Getting started"
  href="/about"
  actionIcon="arrowRight"
>


![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Theme configuration"
  href="/guides/configuration"
  actionIcon="arrowRight"
>


![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
<Column colMd={4} colLg={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
  title="Contributions"
  href="/contributions"
  actionIcon="arrowRight"
>


![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<CardGroup>
<MiniCard title="What's your story?" href="/about" /><MiniCard title="Books I read" href="https://bookauthority.org/profile/eyalbenvenisti" />
</CardGroup>

### Social
<CardGroup>
  <MiniCard title="Twitter" target="=_blank" href="https://twitter.com/kaizenOS" actionIcon="logoTwitter" />
  <MiniCard title="Instagram" target="=_blank" href="https://instagram.com/eyal.benvenisti" actionIcon="Instagram" />
  <MiniCard title="Linkedin" target="=_blank" href="https://linkedin.com/in/eyal.benvenisti" actionIcon="Instagram" />
  <MiniCard title="Current Location" target="=_blank" href="https://storage.benvenisti.rocks/index.php/apps/phonetrack/publicSessionWatch/fe85e46b15ecdd94a9322eff823d3905?lineToggle=0&refresh=15&arrow=0&gradient=0&autozoom=1&tooltip=0&linewidth=4&pointradius=1&nbpoints=1" actionIcon="Instagram" />
</CardGroup>
